name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Prosperous are the believers,

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: who are humble in their prayers;

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: who turn away from idle talk;

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: who give charity,

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: who guard their privates,

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: except with their wives and what their right hand possess, and then they are not blamed.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Those who seek beyond that are transgressors.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: (Prosperous are those) who preserve their trusts and pledges

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: and those who observe their prayers.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Those are the heirs

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: who will inherit Paradise; they shall live there for ever.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: We created the human from an essence of clay:

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: then We made him, a drop, in a secure receptacle (the womb).

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Then We created of the drop, a clot (of congealed blood) and We created the clot into bitesize tissue, then We created the bitesize tissue into bones, thenWe clothed the bones with flesh, and then produced it an other creation. Blessed is Allah, the Best of creators!

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: After that you shall surely die,

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: and be resurrected on the Day of Resurrection.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: We have created seven ways above you; of Our creation, We are never inattentive.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: We sent down water from the sky in due measure, and lodged it in the earth, and We are able to take it all away.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: With it, We produced for you gardens of palms and vines, yielding abundant fruit for you to eat.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Also, a tree which grows on the Tor of Sinai and gives oil and relish for its eaters.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: In the cattle, too, is a lesson for you. We let you drink of that which is in their bellies, and there are many benefits in them for you, and you eat of them,

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: and upon them and on the ships you are carried.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: We sent Noah to his nation. 'Worship Allah, my nation' he said, 'for you have no god except He. Will you not be cautious'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: The unbelieving assembly of his nation said: 'This is but a human like you, who desires to gain superiority over you. Had Allah willed, He could have sent down angels. We never heard of this among our ancient forefathers.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: He is nothing else except a man who is mad, so watch him for awhile.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: He (Noah) said: 'Lord, help me, for they belie me'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: We said to him: 'Make the Ark under Our Eye, and Our Revelation, and then when Our command comes and the oven gushes water, take onboard a pair from every kind and your family, except him against whom the decision has already been passed. Do not address Me concerning those who have done evil; they shall be drowned.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: And when you and all those with you are seated in the Ark, say: 'Praise be to Allah who has saved us from the harmdoing nation'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: And say: 'Lord, let me land a blessed landing. You are the Best of harborers'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Surely, in that are signs, and surely We will put (nations) to the test.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Then We produced after them another generation

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: and We sent to them a Messenger from themselves, saying: 'Worship Allah, for you have no god except He. Will you not be cautious'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: The unbelieving assembly of his nation, who belied the encounter of the Everlasting Life, and on whom We had bestowed ease in this life, said: 'This is but a human like yourselves; he eats of what you eat and drinks of what you drink.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: If you obey a mortal like yourselves, you shall be lost.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: What, does he promise you that when you are dead and turned to dust and bones, you will be brought forth?

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: After, after with that which you are promised!

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: There is nothing but our present life; we die, and we live, and we shall not be resurrected.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: He is nothing but a man who has forged against Allah a lie, we will never believe him'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: He said: 'Help me, Lord, they belie me'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: He replied: 'Before long, by the morning, they shall be remorseful'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: And the Cry seized them in justice and We made them withered. So begone with the harmdoing nation.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: After them We produced other generations

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: no nation outstrips its term, nor do they put it back.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Then We sent Our Messengers in succession. Yet whenever its Messenger came to a nation they belied him, so We made them follow others, and We made them but as tales, so begone the nation who did not believe!

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and clear authority

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: to Pharaoh and his Council, but they were very proud, and they were a tyrannical nation.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: 'What' they said, 'are we to believe in two mortals like us, whose nation are our worshipers'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: So they belied them, and they were among the destroyed.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: And We gave Moses the Book, in order that they might be guided.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign, and gave them a refuge on a hillside where there was a hollow and a spring.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Messengers! Eat of that which is good and do good deeds; I have knowledge of the things you do.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Your nation is but one nation, and I am your Lord, therefore fear Me.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Yet they have split their affairs between themselves into sects, each rejoicing in what it has.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Leave them in their perplexity for a time.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Do they think that in giving them wealth and children

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: We hasten in good works for them? No, they are not aware.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Those who tremble in fear of their Lord,

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: who believe in the verses of their Lord;

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: who associate none with their Lord,

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: who give what they give, with their hearts quaking, that they will return to their Lord:

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: those, hasten in good works, outracing to them.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: We charge no soul with more than it can bear. We have a Book with Us which speaks the truth, and they shall not be wronged.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: But their hearts are in ignorance of this (Koran); and they have deeds besides that which they are doing.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: But when We seize with the punishment those of them that live in ease, they groan.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: (We shall say): 'Do not groan today, surely you shall receive no help from Us'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: My verses were recited to you, but you turned upon your heels,

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: being proud against it, talking foolishness by night.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Should they not think upon the saying? Or, did anything come upon them that had not come upon their ancient forefathers?

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Or, is it because they do not recognize their Messenger that they denied him?

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Do they say he is mad! No, he came to them with the truth, but most of them hate the truth.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Had the truth followed their fancies, the heavens, the earth, and all who live in them would have surely been corrupted. No, We brought them theirRemembrance; but from their Remembrance they turn away.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Or, do you ask a tribute from them? Your Lord's tribute is better. He is the Best of providers.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Indeed you are calling them to a Straight Path,

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: but those who disbelieve in the Everlasting Life deviate from the Path.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: If We had mercy on them and removed their afflictions, they would still persist in their insolence, blindly wandering.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Already We have seized them with the punishment, but they neither humbled themselves to their Lord, nor did they beseech Him,

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: when We opened on them a gate of severe punishment, they utterly despaired.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: It was He who produced for you hearing, eyes, and hearts, yet little is that you thank.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: It was He who scattered you on the earth, and before Him you shall be gathered.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: It is He who revives and makes to die, and to Him belong the alternation of the night and the day. Will you not understand!

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: No, but they said what the ancients said before them:

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: 'When we are dead and become dust and bones shall we be resurrected?

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: We and our fathers have been promised this before. It is but of the ancients' fictitious tales'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Say: "If you have knowledge, 'to whom belongs the earth' and, 'whoever is in it? '"

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: They will say: 'To Allah' Say: 'Then will you not remember'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Say: 'Who is the Lord of the seven heavens, and of the Great Throne'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: They will say: 'Allah' Say: 'Will you not be cautious'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Say: 'In whose Hands is the Kingdom of all things, He protects, and none protects against Him, if you have knowledge'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: 'Allah' they will reply. Say: 'How then can you be so bewitched'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: No, We have brought the truth to them, but they are liars.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Allah has not taken to Himself any son, there is no other god with Him. Were this otherwise each god would have taken that which he created, and some ofthem would have risen above others; Exalted is Allah beyond that they describe!

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: (He is) the Knower of the Unseen and the Seen, High Exalted be He above that they associate.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Say: 'Lord, if You should show me that which they are promised,

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: O my Lord, do not put me among the harmdoing people'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Indeed, We are able to show you that which We promised them.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Repel evil with that which is better. We know that which they describe.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: And say: 'O my Lord, I seek refuge in You from evil suggestions of the satans.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: O my Lord, I seek refuge in You lest they attend me'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Until, when death comes to one of them he says: 'My Lord, let me go back,

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: that I should do righteousness in that I forsook' No! It is only a word which he will speak. Behind them there shall stand a barrier till the Day that they shall be resurrected.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: And when the Horn is blown, on that Day their ties of kindred shall be no more, nor will they ask each other.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Those whose scales are heavy shall prosper,

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: but those whose scales are light shall forfeit their souls and live in Gehenna (Hell) for ever.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: The fire lashes their faces and therein are shriveled lips.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: (We shall say): 'Were My verses not recited to you, and did you not belie them'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: 'Lord' they will reply, 'adversity prevailed over us and we were erring.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Our Lord, bring us out of it. If we return (to sin), then we shall indeed be harmdoers'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: He will say: 'Slink there in it and do not speak to Me'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Among My worshipers there were a party who said: "Lord, we believed. Forgive us and have mercy on us: You are the Best of the merciful."

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: But you took them for laughingstock, mocking at them, until they caused you to forget My remembrance.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Today I shall recompense them for their patience, for it is they that have won.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: And He will ask: 'How many years did you live on earth'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: They will reply: 'A day, or part of a day; ask those who have kept count'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: He will say: 'You have tarried a little, did you know?

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Did you think that We had created you only for play, and that you would never be returned to Us'

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: High Exalted be Allah, the King, the Truth. There is no god except He, the Lord of the Noble Throne.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: Whosoever calls upon another god, other than Allah, having no proof his reckoning will be with his Lord. The unbelievers shall never prosper.

name: Qaribullah & Darwish
transelator_en_name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
text: And say: 'My Lord, forgive and have mercy, for You are the Best of the merciful'
